title: Hold on Before I Forget
lyrics: thinkin bout the you looked at me
the way you’re in my head
well hold on before i forget
not like when we first met
well hold on before i forget
when we had loved so easily
please listen to what i must say
hold to our path shall we not stray
i’ll always catch if you fall
when it’s to hard to say a thing
well hold on before i forget
when we had loved so easily
please listen to what i must say
hold to our path shall we not stray
well hold on before i forget
